description.narrative: Output 5.2: More teachers have core knowledge and competencies to use proven teaching methodologies to deliver appropriate quality education., which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: OUTCOME 5: All children access and complete quality education, within a safe learning environment, with skills and knowledge for lifelong learning

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 5.2: More teachers have core knowledge and competencies to use proven teaching methodologies to deliver appropriate quality education.

description.narrative: 26,099 teachers have improved core knowledge and competencies on learning pedagogies. 478,252 children were provided with individual education/early learning materials through UNICEF supported programmes. Evidence-based policy dialogues and engagement with National and State governments are ongoing to increase investment in Early Childhood Care Development Education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
